topic.title: PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR (HIV END ORGAN DISEASE)
topic.shortdesc: For the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set, PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR (HIV END ORGAN DISEASE) includes where the PATIENT DIAGNOSIS of Severe unstable Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) associated end organ disease has been made, not just during the current HIV Episode.
